backend/main.mo: Defines core ERP data types (products, orders, inventory, invoices) and includes state enums plus storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for two frontend approval‑related features with associated files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their behavior and feature roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Simple HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router handling authentication, bootstrap loading, rejection handling, and approved-user transition to the dashboard.
Component that polls approval status, handles request‑approval actions, and shows pending or rejected UI with logout support.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedApp: Loading shell UI showing placeholder sidebar/header while authenticated data loads.
frontend/src/components/BarcodeGenerator: Generates Code128 and QR barcodes for a product using dynamic libraries and canvas rendering with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the top navigation bar with logo, theme toggle, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/InvoiceGenerator: Builds an invoice image and PDF using canvas drawing, product line items, totals, and optional signature.
frontend/src/components/LoadingWorkspace: Shows a full‑screen animated loading screen for workspace initialization.
frontend/src/components/modules/Analytic: Displays business analytics including order stats, revenue trends, product performance, and access-controlled financial metrics using chart visualizations.
frontend/src/components/modules/BarcodeM: Provides barcode scanning for inventory stock in/out operations with role-based access and confirmation dialogs to update product quantities.
frontend/src/components/modules/Customer: Manages customer records with search, creation, and admin-only deletion, including dialogs and form handling.
frontend/src/components/modules/Dashboar: Shows an overview dashboard with metrics, recent activity, order status charts, and financial indicators based on user role.
frontend/src/components/modules/Inventor: Handles product inventory management including creation, editing, barcode generation, scanning, and filtering with admin-controlled destructive actions.
Loads products, generates barcodes and PDFs using external libraries, and displays an inventory report with error handling.
frontend/src/components/modules/InvoiceH: Displays and filters invoice history with search, sorting, previews, and admin actions for clearing invoices.
frontend/src/components/modules/InvoiceM: Creates invoices by selecting customers and products, calculates totals, adjusts stock, and supports invoice preview.
frontend/src/components/modules/Notifica: Shows system notifications with timestamps, supports marking as read and refreshing the list.
frontend/src/components/modules/OrdersMo: Manages orders with creation, filtering, stock validation, and bulk deletion based on user permissions.
frontend/src/components/modules/ProfitLo: Displays profit and loss reports with date-range filtering, charts, exports, and access control for admin/accountant roles.
frontend/src/components/modules/ReportsM: Aggregates multiple business reports including sales, inventory, data entries, and embeds submodules like ProfitLoss and InventoryReport with access control.
frontend/src/components/modules/Secondar: Manages a list of secondary admin emails with add/remove operations, validation, and mutation-driven updates.
frontend/src/components/modules/UserMana: Provides user management for primary admins, including approval handling, role assignment, and access-restricted UI.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Provides a form for users to enter and save profile details with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Renders a role‑based sidebar menu with mobile support and module navigation.
frontend/src/context/PollingContext.tsx: Context controlling when background polling should run based on dashboard activity, tab visibility, and active module.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls with React Query hooks, handling caching, polling, and mutations for user profiles, orders, inventory, and app bootstrap state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and a custom light/dark theme with optimized animations and UI transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with lazy‑loaded modules, admin checks, and polling control based on active module.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a login screen that triggers Internet Identity authentication and handles loading states.
frontend/src/utils/approvalErrors.ts: Parses backend approval errors into user-friendly messages and exposes helpers for detecting rejection or authorization failures.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceDocument.ts: Provides constants and helper functions for invoice layout, currency/date formatting, line-item building, and total calculations.
frontend/src/utils/stockErrors.ts: Parses various error shapes to detect insufficient-stock issues and formats a user-friendly message with optional stock/requested quantities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash parameters for routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, pending requests, and state versioning for the user management workflow updates.
